trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityDescriptorFlagControl"></xref> class is used to pass flags to the server to control various security descriptor behaviors.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityDescriptorFlagControl.#ctor"></xref> constructor creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityDescriptorFlagControl"></xref> class.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityDescriptorFlagControl.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityMasks)"></xref> constructor creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityDescriptorFlagControl"></xref> class using the specified security masks.
A combination of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityMasks"></xref> values that specify security descriptor options.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityDescriptorFlagControl.GetValue"></xref> method returns the security descriptor options specified for this control.
The security descriptor options specified for this control.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityDescriptorFlagControl.SecurityMasks"></xref> property contains a combination of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityMasks"></xref> values that specify security descriptor options.
A combination of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SecurityMasks"></xref> values that specify security descriptor options.
